TEXT.TITLE: ST LOUIS HOGS SEEN STEADY/UP 0.50 DLR - PRIVATE
TEXT.DATELINE: St Louis, April 7 - Overcast/45 degrees - rain early -
TEXT.BODY: Hog prices are expected to range from steady to 0.50 dlr higher on estimated receipts of 3,000 head, private sources said. Top seen at 50.00 to 50.50 dlrs per cwt. Reuter
